bibl.title: Transmission and Reception: New Testament Text-Critical and Exegetical Studies. (Texts and Studies. Contributions to Biblical and Patristic Literature. Third Series. 4.)
bibl.note: 16 contributions, compiled in honour of Carroll D. Osburn on the occasion of his sixty-fifth birthday. - Pp. xiii-xvii: J.W.Ch. and D.C.P., Preface; - 295-327: Indices.
